forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: livestream

comments.text: i've decided to take up livestreaming whilst i was on my hiatus. i aim to stream most days at 7pm gmt with the odd exception. i understand it isn't easy but i need to push myself.
i'll be the worst streamer to stalk if it ever gets to that though. try as i might, i'm still all about the hermit lifestyle.
livestreams have been slowly improving with technical and verbal adjustments. vr is breaking at random points although not too often thankfully.
i haven't done anything in a long time here. i figured it took too much of a toil on my hardware so i had to stop.
i haven't livestreamed in a long time, i'd like to get back into it really but it takes a toll on me more than any desktop game or even live drawing. i do enjoy the pressure a bit?

thread.latestCommentText: i haven't livestreamed in a long time, i'd like to get back into it really but it takes a toll on me more than any desktop game or even live drawing. i do enjoy the pressure a bit?
